patthana14.1:6.1: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana14.1:6.2: hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana14.1:6.5: hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:6.6: Hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.1:7.1: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:7.2: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:7.3: Nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.1:8.1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:8.2: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:8.3: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana14.1:11.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:12.1: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:13.1: Nahetu dhammo nanahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:14.1: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava … pe … upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca … pe … avigate nava.
